sentence.Network_en: Carbonation is the combination of carbonate or bicarbonate ions with minerals.

sentence.Network_en: Bicarbonate ions also serve as an important base in living tissue.

sentence.Network_en: This modest amount of sodium bicarbonate prevents the potassium depletion and demineralization of bone.
